Package ehextractor

Class FunctionUtils

java.lang.Object
ehextractor.FunctionUtils
public class FunctionUtils extends Object
Utility class for finding functions within a given program using the Ghidra API.

  • Method Details

    • findFunction

      public static ghidra.program.model.listing.Function findFunction(ghidra.program.model.listing.Program program, String partialName, String partialParentNamespace, boolean dereferenceThunks)
      Searches for a function in the given program based on a (possibly partial) name and optionally a (partial) namespace. If needed, thunks can be dereferenced. Tries to account for different ways a function may be known in Ghidra (by name or by label) and for multiple matches.
      Parameters:
      program - The program in which to search for the function.
      partialName - The name (or part of it) of the function to find.
      partialParentNamespace - The namespace (or part of it) of the function to find.
      dereferenceThunks - If true, thunks are dereferenced to their primary functions.
      Returns:
      The matching function, or null if no matching function is found.

    • getInternalFunctions

      public static List<ghidra.program.model.listing.Function> getInternalFunctions(ghidra.program.model.listing.Program program)
      Retrieves all internal functions of the given program.
      Parameters:
      program - The program from which to retrieve all interal functions.
      Returns:
      A list of all internal functions of the given program.
